resources.string:
Terms and Conditions


 Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our Android application. By registering and using our app, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not proceed with the registration process. 



1. Account Registration:

		 1.1 You must be at least 18 years old to 
						 create an account and use our app. 
		 1.2 You agree to provide accurate and 
						 complete information during the 
						 registration process.


 2. App Usage:
 		 2.1 Our app is intended for personal use 
						 only. You may not use the app for any 
						 commercial or illegal purposes. 
		 2.2 You are responsible for maintaining 
						 the confidentiality of your account 
						 information and for all activities that 
						 occur under your account. 
		 2.3 You must not share your account 
						 credentials with anyone else.


 3. Content: 
		 3.1 You acknowledge that all content 
						 provided through the app, including 
						 not limited to text, images, videos, and 
						 audio, is the sole responsibility of the 
						 person or entity that provides the 
						 content. 
		 3.2 You agree not to upload, post, or 
						 transmit any content that is unlawful, 
						 harmful, threatening, 
						 abusive, harassing, defamatory, 
						 obscene, or otherwise objectionable.

 
 4. Intellectual Property: 
		 4.1 The app and all its original content, 
						 features, and functionality are the 
						 exclusive property of [TKT Developers] 
						 and its licensors. 
		 4.2 You may not reproduce, distribute, 
						 modify, create derivative works of, 
						 publicly display, publicly perform, 
						 republish, download, store, or 
						 transmit any of the material on our 
						 app without our prior written consent.


 5. Privacy Policy: 
		 5.1 Your privacy is important to us. 
						 Please review our Privacy Policy 
						 [provide a link to your Privacy Policy] 
						 to understand how we collect, use, 
						 and disclose information about you.


 6. Termination: 
		 6.1 We reserve the right to terminate 
						 or suspend your account and access 
						 to the app without prior notice if 
						 you violate these terms and 
						 conditions. 
		 6.2 You may terminate your account at 
						 any time by contacting us 
						 [contact].


 7. Changes to Terms and Conditions: 
		 7.1 We may revise these terms and 
						 conditions at any time without 
						 prior notice. 
		 7.2 By continuing to use the app 
						 after any revisions become effective, 
						 you agree to be bound by the updated 
						 terms and conditions.


 8. Governing Law: 
		8.1 These terms and conditions shall 
						 be governed by and construed in 
						 accordance 
						 with the laws of Philippines.


 If you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms and conditions, please contact us at [provide contact details].
I agree to the Terms and Conditions
